text:
If you have linear constraints, you can make everything into a QUBO by penalizing the constraints violation (with a high enough penalty).
Say you have a constraint `x + y + z = 1` , just add a term `t*(1 - x - y - z)^2` to the objective with a high coefficient `t`.

Bottom line, if you can convert your PBO into a MIP, you can convert it to a QUBO.
